DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to see if the 99mTechnetium-MIBI SPECT-CT can be a tool for preoperative evaluation of cervical node metastasis in papillary thyroid cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot 99mTechnetium-MIBI Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography - Computed Tomography (SPECT-CT) in Papillary Carcinoma (CA) Thyroid
DOC.criteria: papillary thyroid cancer pregnancy Bleeding abnormality Prior history of head and neck cancer can not perform 99mTechnetiumMIBI SPECTCT can not perform 131I remnant Ablation Prior any head and neck surgery within 3 months Prior deep neck infection within 3 months
